listeningQuestion.question: How did Jane make a friend in Holland?
listeningQuestion.translation: 简是如何交到荷兰朋友的？

editorNotes: 本课讲述了一个女孩通过漂流瓶结识外国笔友的故事，重点介绍了dream的用法，以及各种介词搭配的动词用法。

dialogueText.heading: 课文
notes: My daughter, Jane, never dreamed of receiving a letter from a girl of her own age in Holland.
Last year, we were travelling across the Channel and Jane put a piece of paper with her name and address on it into a bottle.
She threw the bottle into the sea.
She never thought of it again, but ten months later, she received a letter from a girl in Holland.
Both girls write to each other regularly now.
However, they have decided to use the post office.
Letters will cost a little more, but they will certainly travel faster.

translation.heading: 翻译
notes: 我的女儿简从未想过会接到荷兰一位同龄姑娘的来信。
去年，当我们横渡英吉利海峡时，简把写有她姓名和住址的一张纸条装进了一只瓶子，
此后她就再没去想那只瓶子。但10个月以后，她收到了荷兰一位姑娘的来信。
现在这两位姑娘定期通信了。
然而她们还是决定利用邮局。
这样会稍微多花点钱，但肯定是快得多了。

vocabulary.heading: New words and expressions 生词和短语

notes.toggle: vi. 做梦，梦见；梦想；想到
n. 年龄；时代；阶段；寿命，使用年限
vt. 引导，开导；形成河道

notes.title: dream的用法
content: 1. dream that + 从句：表示做梦梦见某事
2. dream of/about + 名词/动名词：表示梦想做某事

notes.title: 动词+介词的固定搭配
content: 1. 动词+of：dream of, think of, hear of等

notes.example: I dream of becoming a teacher.
She has many friends of her own age.

notes.context: 表示双方保持通信联系
notes.example: The two friends write to each other every week.
The new house costs a little more than the old one.

multipleChoice.question: How did Jane send her message to Holland?
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中提到Jane把纸条放在瓶子里扔进了海里

multipleChoice.question: How do the girls communicate now?
multipleChoice.explanation: 文中说'they have decided to use the post office'

notes.title: 文化背景
notes.content: 漂流瓶是一种浪漫的通信方式，在历史上曾被用于求救、传递信息等。现代社会中，它更多地成为一种浪漫的尝试，让人们有机会结识来自世界各地的朋友。

notes.title: 语言点拓展
notes.content: 英语中表示'互相'的词有each other和one another，通常each other用于两个人之间，而one another用于三个或更多人之间，但在实际使用中这个区别并不严格。
